alert.note: Alert for Greene; Monroe; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 11:00PM EST until March 12 at 4:36PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Indiana... White River. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... White River. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected at nearly all locations, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Road south of river gage begins to flood. Gosport Road closes. Extensive agricultural flooding is in progress. Moon Road in very rural northwest Monroe County is extensively flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday afternoon by around 400 PM EST /300 PM CST/.
